rows.label: qst700503_msg0001
rows.name:
Yup, just need to finish the
fine details... and there.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0002
rows.name:
My heart is pounding. I'm
excited for it to be done, but
it also feels like a waste.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0003
rows.name:
That's also part of the
charm of handmade things.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0004
rows.name:
Especially when giving it
to someone you're interested
in. I hope they like it.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0005
rows.name:
...Hey, can I ask something? How
do you make something like this?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh my. Is there someone
you want to give it to?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0007
rows.name: Are you thinking about Adel?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0008
rows.name:
Huh!? It's not... I was just
thinking I wanted one for myself.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0009
rows.name:
For example, I think
everyone has feelings they
can't express honestly.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0010
rows.name:
I think it's okay to entrust
those feelings to something
and convey them that way.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0011
rows.name:
...What if you can't make
it well? Wouldn't that be
even more embarrassing?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0012
rows.name:
There's no need to worry. Just the
feeling that you put in the effort to
prepare it should make them happy.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0013
rows.name: ...Is that how it is?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0014
rows.name:
Want to try making something
next time? I can teach
you if it's simple.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0015
rows.name:
That sounds nice. I
would love to watch.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0016
rows.name: I'd like to join in too!

rows.label: qst700503_msg0017
rows.name: Then, perhaps I shall join as well.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0018
rows.name: Then... me too.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0019
rows.name:
All right, then let's
all make something!

rows.label: qst700503_msg0020
rows.name:
That sounds like fun.
...Speaking of which,

rows.label: qst700503_msg0021
rows.name: Wadatsumi has completely blended in.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0022
rows.name: Quite the hero.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0023
rows.name: Indeed. How does one do that?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0024
rows.name: Could it be you're jealous, Hugo?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0025
rows.name: You're at that age, Your Majesty.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0026
rows.name:
Wh-What are you talking about...
Shin, say something to them.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0027
rows.name: Me? Well, that is...

rows.label: qst700503_msg0028
rows.name: It seems Shin agrees with us.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0029
rows.name: I haven't said anything yet.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0030
rows.name: Adel, I will get angry, you know?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0031
rows.name: Hahahaha, how scary.
